targets.query: SELECT last("/components/component/properties/property/state/value"::string) FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" = 'Chassis' AND "/components/component/properties/property/@name" =~ /allocated|capacity|maximum/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$device$/", "/components/component/properties/property/@name", "/components/component/@name" fill(null)

SELECT last("/components/component/properties/property/state/value"::string) FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /PEM/ AND "/components/component/properties/property/@name" = 'power-dc-output' AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/components/component/@name", "/components/component/properties/property/@name", "/^$device$/" fill(null)

SELECT last("property_value") FROM "autogen"."jti_components" WHERE ("component_name" =~ /PDU/ AND "property_name" = 'power-usage' OR "property_name" =~ /power_input/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "component_name", "property_name", "/^$device$/" fill(null)

SELECT last("/components/component/properties/property/state/value") FROM "autogen"."jti_components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /SFB|CB|Routing Engine|Chassis/ AND "/components/component/properties/property/@name" =~ /temperature/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/components/component/@name", "/^$device$/", "/components/component/properties/property/@name" fill(null)

SELECT last("/components/component/state/part-no") AS "P/N", last("/components/component/state/serial-no") AS "Serial" FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /^$component$/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$component$/", "/^$device$/" fill(null) LIMIT 1

SELECT last("/components/component/state/part-no") AS "P/N", last("/components/component/state/serial-no") AS "Serial" FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /^$component$/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$component$/", "/^$device$/" fill(null) LIMIT 1

SELECT last("/components/component/state/part-no") AS "P/N", last("/components/component/state/serial-no") AS "Serial" FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /^$component$/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$component$/", "/^$device$/" fill(null) LIMIT 1

SELECT last("/components/component/state/part-no") AS "P/N", last("/components/component/state/serial-no") AS "Serial" FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /^$component$/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$component$/", "/^$device$/" fill(null) LIMIT 1

SELECT last("/components/component/state/part-no") AS "P/N", last("/components/component/state/serial-no") AS "Serial" FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /^$component$/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$component$/", "/^$device$/" fill(null) LIMIT 1

SELECT last("/components/component/state/part-no") AS "P/N", last("/components/component/state/serial-no") AS "Serial" FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /^$component$/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$component$/", "/^$device$/" fill(null) LIMIT 1

SELECT last("/components/component/state/part-no") AS "P/N", last("/components/component/state/serial-no") AS "Serial" FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /^$component$/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$component$/", "/^$device$/" fill(null) LIMIT 1

SELECT last("/components/component/state/part-no") AS "P/N", last("/components/component/state/serial-no") AS "Serial" FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /^$component$/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$component$/", "/^$device$/" fill(null) LIMIT 1

SELECT last("/components/component/state/part-no") AS "P/N", last("/components/component/state/serial-no") AS "Serial" FROM "autogen"."components" WHERE ("/components/component/@name" =~ /^$component$/ AND "device" =~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "/^$component$/", "/^$device$/" fill(null) LIMIT 1

list.definition: show tag values from jti_components with key = device;
list.name: device
list.query: show tag values from jti_components with key = device;

list.definition: show tag values from jti_components with key = "component_name" where component_name =~ /SFB|CB|routing_engine|Chassis|SIB|PDU|Fan/;
list.name: chassis
list.query: show tag values from jti_components with key = "component_name" where component_name =~ /SFB|CB|routing_engine|Chassis|SIB|PDU|Fan/;

list.definition: show tag values from jti_components with key = "component_name"  where device =~ /^$device$/ and component_name =~ /ADC[0-9]{1,2}$/
list.name: adc
list.query: show tag values from jti_components with key = "component_name"  where device =~ /^$device$/ and component_name =~ /ADC[0-9]{1,2}$/

list.definition: show tag values from jti_components with key = "component_name"  where device =~ /^$device$/ and component_name =~ /FPC[0-9]{1,}$/
list.name: fpc
list.query: show tag values from jti_components with key = "component_name"  where device =~ /^$device$/ and component_name =~ /FPC[0-9]{1,}$/

list.definition: show tag values from jti_components with key = component_name where device =~ /^$device$/ and component_name =~ /FPC[0-9]{1,2}:CPU$/
list.name: fpc_cpu
list.query: show tag values from jti_components with key = component_name where device =~ /^$device$/ and component_name =~ /FPC[0-9]{1,2}:CPU$/

list.definition: show tag values from jti_components with key = "component_name"  where device =~ /^$device$/ and component_name =~ /PSM|PEM/

list.definition: show tag values from jti_linecard_cpu_memory with key = "component_name"  where device =~ /^$device$/ and component_name =~ /FPC[0-9]{1,2}:CPU[0-9]{1,2}/
